scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend:watch: docker-compose exec backend npm run test:watch
scripts.test:backend:coverage: docker-compose exec backend npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: docker-compose exec backend npm run lint
scripts.lint:frontend: docker-compose exec frontend npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend:fix && npm run lint:frontend:fix
scripts.lint:backend:fix: docker-compose exec backend npm run lint:fix
scripts.lint:frontend:fix: docker-compose exec frontend npm run lint:fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.type-check:backend: docker-compose exec backend npm run type-check
scripts.type-check:frontend: docker-compose exec frontend npm run type-check
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
